name: Love Exalt 8372
storyline: In a world where monsters have been farmed to extinction for XP, twelve people with unique RPG classes board a train; among these twelve people, the last monster is hiding. Some passengers are oblivious victims, while others boarded this train with a plan already in motion.
summary: A furry visual novel about a death game on a train. Read the minds of characters through minigames, choose which perspectives you want to see, and uncover the mysterious lore behind twelve unique characters.
